name: Strongest Player
author: 衣月动漫
content: By the time you see this message, the life-or-death game to reclaim our planet has already begun. All players must journey together through alternate worlds to find a chance to redeem their homeland. Those eliminated become spectators. Su Ming’an, who possesses the unique power of death rollback, is hailed as the strongest First Player, the pillar of peak strength, and the torchbearer of humanity in its darkest age. In this life-and-death maze, can he lead humanity toward the best possible futur
